resources.string: No connections available. Use the ● next to each verse to check if that verse has connections.
You need to download library to open book. Go to Setting on bottom of Home screen to download.
We recommend the offline-library for a better experience. It is approximately 250MB. Otherwise, you can continue to use online mode.
Without storage permissions, you cannot use the Offline Library. Go to Settings in the main menu of the app to download the offline Library.

No one is perfect, and Sefaria is no exception. If you spot a mistake, we want to know about it. However, we find that most textual errors that get reported to us are not in fact mistakes. This is in part due to textual variances between different editions of a text. To properly report a typo or textual error to Sefaria, make sure to include what you think the text should be and what you are using to make your determination. If you are looking at a printed book, please provide enough information to uniquely identify the book you\'re using. If the edition you\'re using is not the same as the edition we are using, we will be unlikely to change the text based simply on differing textual traditions. We will only change it if we believe that either the printer made a mistake, or we made a mistake when we digitized a text. Textual differences can be handled by adding the second textual tradition as another text version.

If you spot a mistake, we want to know about it. However, we find that most textual errors that get reported to us are not in fact mistakes. This is in part due to textual variances between different editions of a text. To properly report a typo or textual error to Sefaria, make sure to include:

1. What you think the text should be.

2. What you are using to make your determination. If you are looking at a printed book, please provide enough information to uniquely identify the book you're using.

Your library is downloading and installing. This should only take a few minutes. If it is taking longer than 5-10 minutes after downloading, then cancel update.
There is no new update to download. Try again later.
Do you want to download the new Sefaria library now?\nYou can always tap \'Update Library\' in settings to update.
Are you sure you want to cancel?
Your update would need to be restarted
You are using mobile data (not Wi-Fi). The library is about 200MB. Do you want to download it anyway?
Requires ~250MB of storage on your device
Are you sure you want to delete the library?
If you delete the library, you will need an internet connection to use Sefaria

English from The William Davidson digital edition of the Koren Noé Talmud, with commentary by Rabbi Adin Steinsaltz Even-Israel
